posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server123$ hexo server$ hexo server --open$ hexo server --draft --open More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment Generate static files and deploy to remote sites1$ hexo g -d

posts.title: how to draw a graph on md document
posts.text: gravizo is the best solution to draw agraph on markdown documents. You sould check this 1234567891011121314151617![Alt text](http://g.gravizo.com/g? digraph G { aize ="4,4"; main [shape=box]; main -> parse [weight=8]; parse -> execute; main -> init [style=dotted]; main -> cleanup; execute -> { make_string; printf}; init -> make_string; edge [color=red]; main -> printf [style=bold,label="100 times"]; make_string [label="make a string"]; node [shape=box,style=filled,color=".7 .3 1.0"]; execute -> compare; })
